p: Winter 2010/11 evidently was an exceptional period for Natterer's bats (Figure 1), and including this winter in the regression model inevitably would force the choice of the least parsimonious model, no matter whether the rest of the study period would allow a simpler model. We therefore built the regression model for this species from summer 2011 to summer 2015, excluding the exceptional winter 2010/11.
